lines.text:
[after shooting up the Caravaggio painting to get the criminals]
Fuck art!

[to his gang]
The trick is they'll never beat you if you stick together and stay loyal.
His story's so stupid it's probably true.

[to hostages, flaunting his automatic weapon]
Say hello to my little friend!

[to Michael]
You know what you are? Wouldn't be everybody's cup of tea, but it suits me.
